verses.verse: O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he is good: <S%H2896><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Let the redeemed <S%H1350><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> say <S%H559><s%> so, whom <S%H834><s%> he hath redeemed <S%H1350><s%> from the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy; <S%H6862><s%>

And gathered <S%H6908><s%> them out of the lands, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> from the east, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4217><s%> and from the west, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4628><s%> from the north, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> and from the south. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3220><s%>
They wandered <S%H8582><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> in a solitary <S%H3452><s%> way; <S%H1870><s%> they found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> to dwell <S%H4186><s%> in.
Hungry <S%H7457><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> thirsty, <S%H6771><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> fainted <S%H5848><s%> in them.
Then they cried <S%H6817><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble, <S%H6862><s%> and he delivered <S%H5337><s%> them out of their distresses. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4691><s%>
And he led them forth <S%H1869><s%> by the right <S%H3477><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> that they might go <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H413><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of habitation. <S%H4186><s%>
Oh that men would praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for his goodness, <S%H2617><s%> and for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he satisfieth <S%H7646><s%> the longing <S%H8264><s%> soul, <S%H5315><s%> and filleth <S%H4390><s%> the hungry <S%H7457><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> with goodness. <S%H2896><s%>
Such as sit <S%H3427><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> and in the shadow of death, <S%H6757><s%> being bound <S%H615><s%> in affliction <S%H6040><s%> and iron; <S%H1270><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> they rebelled against <S%H4784><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of God, <S%H410><s%> and contemned <S%H5006><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the most High: <S%H5945><s%>
Therefore he brought down <S%H3665><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> with labor; <S%H5999><s%> they fell down, <S%H3782><s%> and there was none <S%H369><s%> to help. <S%H5826><s%>
Then they cried <S%H2199><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble, <S%H6862><s%> and he saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of their distresses. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4691><s%>
He brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of darkness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2822><s%> and the shadow of death, <S%H6757><s%> and broke <S%H5423><s%> their bands <S%H4147><s%> in sunder.
Oh that men would praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for his goodness, <S%H2617><s%> and for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he hath broken <S%H7665><s%> the gates <S%H1817><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> and cut <S%H1438><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> in sunder.
Fools <S%H191><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> of their transgression, <S%H6588><s%> and because of their iniquities, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5771><s%> are afflicted. <S%H6031><s%>
Their soul <S%H5315><s%> abhorreth <S%H8581><s%> all manner <S%H3605><s%> of meat; <S%H400><s%> and they draw near <S%H5060><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%>
Then they cry <S%H2199><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble, <S%H6862><s%> and he saveth <S%H3467><s%> them out of their distresses. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4691><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> his word, <S%H1697><s%> and healed <S%H7495><s%> them, and delivered <S%H4422><s%> them from their destructions. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7825><s%>
Oh that men would praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for his goodness, <S%H2617><s%> and for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
And let them sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> and declare <S%H5608><s%> his works <S%H4639><s%> with rejoicing. <S%H7440><s%>
They that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%> in ships, <S%H591><s%> that do <S%H6213><s%> business <S%H4399><s%> in great <S%H7227><s%> waters; <S%H4325><s%>
These <S%H1992><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and his wonders <S%H6381><s%> in the deep. <S%H4688><s%>
For he commandeth, <S%H559><s%> and raiseth <S%H5975><s%> the stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind, <S%H7307><s%> which lifteth up <S%H7311><s%> the waves <S%H1530><s%> thereof.

They mount up <S%H5927><s%> to the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> they go down <S%H3381><s%> again to the depths: <S%H8415><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> is melted <S%H4127><s%> because of trouble. <S%H7451><s%>
They reel to and fro, <S%H2287><s%> and stagger <S%H5128><s%> like a drunken man, <S%H7910><s%> and are at their wits' end. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2451><s%> <S%H1104><s%>
Then they cry <S%H6817><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble, <S%H6862><s%> and he bringeth them out <S%H3318><s%> of their distresses. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4691><s%>
He maketh <S%H6965><s%> the storm <S%H5591><s%> a calm, <S%H1827><s%> so that the waves <S%H1530><s%> thereof are still. <S%H2814><s%>
Then are they glad <S%H8055><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they be quiet; <S%H8367><s%> so he bringeth <S%H5148><s%> them unto <S%H413><s%> their desired <S%H2656><s%> haven. <S%H4231><s%>
Oh that men would praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for his goodness, <S%H2617><s%> and for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
Let them exalt <S%H7311><s%> him also in the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and praise <S%H1984><s%> him in the assembly <S%H4186><s%> of the elders. <S%H2205><s%>
He turneth <S%H7760><s%> rivers <S%H5104><s%> into a wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and the watersprings <S%H4325><s%> <S%H4161><s%> into dry ground; <S%H6774><s%>
A fruitful <S%H6529><s%> land <S%H776><s%> into barrenness, <S%H4420><s%> for the wickedness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7451><s%> of them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein.
He turneth <S%H7760><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> into a standing <S%H98><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> and dry <S%H6723><s%> ground <S%H776><s%> into watersprings. <S%H4161><s%> <S%H4325><s%>
And there <S%H8033><s%> he maketh the hungry to dwell, <S%H3427><s%> <S%H7457><s%> that they may prepare <S%H3559><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> for habitation; <S%H4186><s%>
And sow <S%H2232><s%> the fields, <S%H7704><s%> and plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> which may yield <S%H6213><s%> fruits <S%H6529><s%> of increase. <S%H8393><s%>
He blesseth <S%H1288><s%> them also, so that they are multiplied <S%H7235><s%> greatly; <S%H3966><s%> and suffereth not <S%H3808><s%> their cattle <S%H929><s%> to decrease. <S%H4591><s%>
Again, they are minished <S%H4591><s%> and brought low <S%H7817><s%> through oppression, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6115><s%> affliction, <S%H7451><s%> and sorrow. <S%H3015><s%>

He poureth <S%H8210><s%> contempt <S%H937><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> princes, <S%H5081><s%> and causeth them to wander <S%H8582><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H8414><s%> where there is no <S%H3808><s%> way. <S%H1870><s%>
Yet setteth he the poor on high <S%H7682><s%> <S%H34><s%> from affliction, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6040><s%> and maketh <S%H7760><s%> him families <S%H4940><s%> like a flock. <S%H6629><s%>
The righteous <S%H3477><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it, and rejoice: <S%H8055><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%> shall stop <S%H7092><s%> her mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Whoso <S%H4310><s%> is wise, <S%H2450><s%> and will observe <S%H8104><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, even they shall understand <S%H995><s%> the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
